page.title: 17LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: {HEXHAM AREA Hexham town is a rural market town which is the focal point for a number of villages in the area. {ACOMB VILLAGE The village of Acomb is North of Hexham across the River Tyne.It is surrounded by fields and farms.There is a shop and a school in the village. The shop sells all kinds of things. There are a lot of different kinds of houses in Acomb.Some are private houses and there are council houses in Millersfield and on the Redburn Estate.There is a bus garage where the Tyne Valley buses go from.On the edge of the village is Howford Quarry where a lot of stone comes from.The land around Acomb is hilly and the school is up on a hill called Bishop Hill.
